page.title: 17Buying and Selling in Rawdon
page.content: There is no large shopping centre in our D-block,but small local shops are grouped near the junction of Harrogate and Leeds road and in Town Street. There is one new hypermarket near the eastern boundary and others within easy reach in all directions.Many residents do much of their shopping in larger shopping areas in Yeadon and Horsforth,Bradford and Leeds city centres and Otley open market.Local food shops include bakeries,grocers, green-grocers butchers and farm shop. Hot food is available from 5 fish and chip shops and 2 Chinese takeaways. Non-food shops include postofices, newsagents,clothes,DIY,chemists and many of the small workshops that sell direct to the public.These small factotry shops advertise their goods and services in local papers,magazines and through posters in shop windows.
